data.lyric:
[ti:Night Falls (《后裔3》电视剧插曲)]
[ar:Dove Cameron/Sofia Carson/Booboo Stewart/Cameron Boyce/Thomas Doherty/China Anne McClain/Dylan Playfair]
[al:Descendants 3(Original TV Movie Soundtrack)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Night Falls - Dove Cameron/Sofia Carson/Booboo Stewart/Cameron Boyce/Thomas Doherty/China Anne McClain/Dylan Playfair
[00:02.77]Lyrics by：Antonina Armato/Thomas Sturges/Adam Schmalholz/Tim James
[00:04.40]Composed by：Antonina Armato/Thomas Sturges/Adam Schmalholz/Tim James
[00:06.03]Both：
[00:06.19]Watch your back watch your back
[00:07.71]Watch your back watch your back
[00:09.12]We can counter their attack hit 'em 'til the armor cracks
[00:11.82]China Anne McClain/Dove Cameron/Sofia Carson：
[00:12.16]This could get a little sticky
[00:15.28]How to win this battle could be tricky but I know the best way
[00:19.70]Fall back let me lead you hold the line
[00:22.28]And we'll bring them to their knees
[00:24.20]Swords in the air if you're with me
[00:26.54]They got us outnumbered one to fifty
[00:30.12]But victory is ours 'cause I got a strategy you take the left
[00:34.27]And the rest of you can follow me
[00:35.87]Un-uh
[00:36.61]This is my crew
[00:37.73]This is my squad
[00:39.53]This is my turf
[00:40.72]Oh my gosh
[00:42.62]Look guys
[00:43.35]We've got bigger fish to fry
[00:44.77]Put your differences aside
[00:46.34]'Cause right now we're on the same side
[00:48.01]Sofia Carson/Both：
[00:48.43]Until the night falls everyone
[00:51.41]We'll stay together 'til the battle is done
[00:54.22]Watch your back watch your back
[00:55.68]Watch your back watch your back
[00:57.17]We can counter their attack hit 'em 'til the armor cracks
[01:00.44]Until the night falls we're aligned
[01:03.40]It doesn't mean that we're on the same side
[01:06.17]Watch your back watch your back
[01:07.65]Watch your back watch your back
[01:09.11]Hit 'em hard and hit 'em fast they're too heavy to react
[01:11.82]Dove Cameron/China Anne McClain：
[01:12.21]This situation's getting kinda heavy
[01:15.16]Hold your weapons tight keep 'em steady
[01:18.02]'Cause if we stick together we can make it out alive
[01:20.95]I'll cause a distraction you attack them from the side
[01:24.17]All my soldiers stand at the ready
[01:27.15]We can cut 'em up like a confetti
[01:30.30]We'll hit 'em from the front you counter from behind
[01:33.17]Don't forget the fate of Auradon's on the line
[01:35.52]All/Dove Cameron：
[01:35.94]This is all out war they got us outnumbered
[01:39.14]The way the swords clash is the sound of the thunder
[01:42.31]And we are not going under we will never run for cover
[01:45.09]We battle for the victory and ride for each other
[01:47.84]Sofia Carson/Both：
[01:48.45]Until the night falls everyone
[01:51.38]We'll stay together 'til the battle is done
[01:54.25]Back to back back to back
[01:55.62]Back to back back to back
[01:57.16]We can counter their attack hit 'em 'til the armor cracks
[02:00.46]Until the night falls we're aligned
[02:03.34]It doesn't mean that we're on the same side
[02:06.15]Back to back back to back
[02:07.64]Back to back back to back
[02:09.13]Hit 'em hard and hit 'em fast they're too heavy to react
[02:12.48]Dove Cameron：
[02:13.65]Suit of armor strong and true
[02:15.70]Make this metal bust a move
[02:17.68]Sofia Carson/Both：
[02:54.51]Until the night falls you can trust
[02:57.36]I'm gonna help you win this battle because
[02:59.96]I got your back got your back
[03:01.65]Got your back got your back
[03:03.18]All for one and that's a fact knights fall pitch black
data.trans:
[ti:Night Falls (《后裔3》电视剧插曲)]
[ar:Dove Cameron/Sofia Carson/Booboo Stewart/Cameron Boyce/Thomas Doherty/China Anne McClain/Dylan Playfair]
[al:Descendants 3(Original TV Movie Soundtrack)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:02.77]//
[00:04.40]//
[00:06.03]//
[00:06.19]当心背后 当心背后
[00:07.71]当心背后 当心背后
[00:09.12]我们可以反击 直到将他们的盔甲摧毁
[00:11.82]//
[00:12.16]这件事也许不太容易
[00:15.28]要打赢这场战争也许困难重重 但我知道最佳方案
[00:19.70]退后 让我来指挥 守住防线
[00:22.28]我们要让他们跪地屈服
[00:24.20]如果你跟我一起 就必须面对枪林弹雨
[00:26.54]敌人的人数是我们的五十倍
[00:30.12]但胜利终将属于我们 因为我们有绝佳的战略 你从左侧进攻
[00:34.27]其他人跟着我
[00:35.87]//
[00:36.61]这是我的战友
[00:37.73]这是我的军队
[00:39.53]这是我的战场
[00:40.72]天哪
[00:42.62]兄弟们 快看
[00:43.35]我们有更重要的事情要做
[00:44.77]暂且忽略分歧
[00:46.34]因为现在 我们是一条船上的人
[00:48.01]//
[00:48.43]直到夜幕降临 各位
[00:51.41]我们会并肩作战 直到战斗结束
[00:54.22]当心背后 当心背后
[00:55.68]当心背后 当心背后
[00:57.17]我们可以反击 直到将他们的盔甲摧毁
[01:00.44]我们团结一致 直到夜幕降临
[01:03.40]这并不意味着我们站在同一战线
[01:06.17]当心背后 当心背后
[01:07.65]当心背后 当心背后
[01:09.11]疯狂攻击对方 让他们无力反抗
[01:11.82]//
[01:12.21]情况越来越复杂
[01:15.16]握紧你的武器 坚定你的信念
[01:18.02]只要我们万众一心 我们就能活下来
[01:20.95]我来分散对方的注意力 你从侧面进攻
[01:24.17]战士们厉兵秣马 准备战斗
[01:27.15]我们要将敌军彻底粉碎
[01:30.30]我们前后夹击
[01:33.17]千钧一发之际 别忘了Auradon的命运
[01:35.52]//
[01:35.94]这是一场决胜之战 敌方人数众多
[01:39.14]刀光剑影 兵器碰撞的声音如雷声般刺耳
[01:42.31]我们不会畏手畏脚 我们不会逃命
[01:45.09]我们为胜利而战 为彼此而战
[01:47.84]//
[01:48.45]直到夜幕降临 各位
[01:51.38]我们会并肩作战 直到战斗结束
[01:54.25]相互扶持 共同进退
[01:55.62]相互扶持 共同进退
[01:57.16]我们可以反击 直到将他们的盔甲摧毁
[02:00.46]我们团结一致 直到夜幕降临
[02:03.34]这并不意味着我们站在同一战线
[02:06.15]相互扶持 共同进退
[02:07.64]相互扶持 共同进退
[02:09.13]疯狂攻击对方 让他们无力反抗
[02:12.48]//
[02:13.65]战士的盔甲 坚硬又牢固
[02:15.70]将金属盔甲彻底撕碎
[02:17.68]//
[02:54.51]直到夜幕降临 你尽管放心
[02:57.36]我会帮你赢得这场战斗 因为
[02:59.96]我一直守护在你身后
[03:01.65]守护在你身后
[03:03.18]万众一心 毋庸置疑 骑士们在黑夜中一个个倒下
